pongIntro.paragraph1: Step back in time to 1972, when two paddles, one bouncing ball, and a black-and-white screen changed gaming forever. Pong isn't just a game ‚Äî it's the spark that lit the video game revolution. Simple, addictive, and endlessly competitive, this digital table tennis classic brings back the golden age of arcade fun.
pongIntro.paragraph2: Whether you're here for nostalgia or discovering it for the first time, Pong proves that great gameplay never gets old. So grab your paddle, challenge a friend, and see who can keep the rally going the longest.
pongIntro.conclusion: Let the original battle of reflexes begin! üèì
